title: Got a photo of Walter Tracy?
content:
Does anybody have a better photo of Walter Tracy than this? This one if from the linotype page

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012143457im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/waltertracy_6530.jpg)

Thanks

 [‹ Serif Id Please](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012143457/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47023 "Go to previous forum topic") [Bitmap web text ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012143457/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47002 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Eben Sorkin

comments.content:
That’s the same image as Sebastian Carter’s <cite>Twentieth Century Type Designers</cite> and the only one I’ve ever seen.

— K.
